LanguageData.Chemshine.label: chemshine
LanguageData.Chemshine.description: A dangerous alcohol usually consumed by rimworld prospectors and industrial settlers. Whilst it takes away the sadness and pain, chemshine intoxicates the blood of the drinker with chemfuel, resulting in a powerful explosion upon death.
LanguageData.ChemBoiler.label: chemboiler
LanguageData.ChemBoiler.description: A device that converts chemfuel into heat. Simple machinery doesn't allow the temperature to be adjusted.
LanguageData.Chemlamp.label: chemlamp
LanguageData.Chemlamp.description: A lamp fueled by chemfuel. Can be safely placed outside.
LanguageData.ChemlampPost.label: chemlamp post
LanguageData.ChemlampPost.description: A post with a pre-industrial chemfuel lamp. Can be safely placed outside.
LanguageData.Building_ChemshineBarrel.label: chemshine barrel
LanguageData.DoorSaloon.label: saloon door
LanguageData.DoorSaloon.description: A saloon door for your country needs. Whilst it doesn't provide much protection, it swings open nearly instantaneously.
LanguageData.Post.label: post
LanguageData.Post.description: An old-styled post to hold down a roof.
LanguageData.StoolBar.label: bar stool
LanguageData.TableCircular.label: Circular table
LanguageData.TableCircular.description: Simple, circular table that can be eaten off of.
LanguageData.TableFaro.label: faro table
LanguageData.TableFaro.description: A soft-topped bound table for playing faro. Allows up to two players at a time.
LanguageData.TableFiveFingerFilet.label: five finger fillet table
LanguageData.TableFiveFingerFilet.description: A wooden table for playing five finger fillet. Might lose a finger or two.\n\nWhilst this activity leads to cuts on the fingers of players, it also slowly trains melee skill.
LanguageData.Gun_GatlingGun.label: gatling gun
LanguageData.Gun_GatlingGun.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Bullet_GatlingGun.label: gattling bullet
LanguageData.Turret_GatlingGun.label: gatling gun turret
LanguageData.Turret_GatlingGun.description: A portable, old time turret. Needs to be manned in order to be operated. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Firing speed increases the longer this turret fires. May explode when damaged.
LanguageData.Windmill.label: windmill
LanguageData.Windmill.description: A wind-powered electrical generator of older make. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_Bandana.label: bandana
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_Bandana.description: A warm and long piece of fabric protecting the jaw from exposure to wind. Makes one hard to remember.
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_Sombrero.label: sombrero
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_Sombrero.description: Used to shield the wearer from the sun. Required for any kind of stand-off.
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_FlatCap.label: flat cap
LanguageData.VFES_Headgear_FlatCap.description: A flat and handy cap. Somewhat protecting from the sun. Worn by settlers and colonists during their daily occupations.
LanguageData.Apparel_Vest.description: A simple vest, providing a decent layer of insulation from both heat and cold. Greatly enhances social interactions.
LanguageData.Apparel_Vest.label: vest
LanguageData.Apparel_GreatDress.description: A great dress, most often worn by ladies and suffragettes. Greatly enhances social interactions.
LanguageData.Apparel_GreatDress.label: great dress
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_DoubleActionRevolver.label: double-action revolver
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_DoubleActionRevolver.descriptio: An ancient pattern double-action revolver. It's not very accurate, but has a decent firing speed for a pistol and is quick on the draw.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_DoubleBarreledShotgun.label: double-barreled shotgun
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_DoubleBarreledShotgun.descripti: An ancient design of shotgun with two individually loaded barrels, that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_HuntingRifle.label: hunting rifle
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_HuntingRifle.description: An ancient pattern bolt-action rifle with a scope. With its exceptional range, and low fire rate, it is unlikely to drive animals to revenge, which makes it an excellent choice for hunting.
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_HuntingRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VFES_Gun_HuntingRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VFES_Weapon_GrenadeDynamite.label: dynamite
LanguageData.VFES_Weapon_GrenadeDynamite.description: A makeshift explosive stick of chemfuel. They can be thrown a short distance, where it will explode after a random amount of time.
LanguageData.VFES_Proj_Dynamite.label: frag grenade
LanguageData.VFES_Tomahawk.label: tomahawk
LanguageData.VFES_Tomahawk.description: A single-handed axe resembling of a hatchet. Light enough to be thrown accurately at medium range.
LanguageData.VFES_Tomahawk.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VFES_Tomahawk.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.VFES_Tomahawk_Thrown.label: throwing tomahawk
LanguageData.Plant_Chemroot.label: chemroot
LanguageData.Plant_Chemroot.description: This highly volatile root is farmed for its chemfuel. It's difficult to harvest and only grows in extremely fertile soil. Despite the risk of a large, chain explosion, these plants are frequently farmed by desperate ranchers and imperial agro-companies alike.
LanguageData.VFES_Weapon_GrenadeDynamite.label.label: dynamite stick
